item.title: 阿波罗的斯洛克说，今天的平静稍后将让位于更艰难的着陆
item.description:
他说，现在已经出现了裂缝，想象一下如果失业率攀升会发生什么

。【原文：

There are cracks showing now, he says, so imagine what happens if joblessness creeps up

】

item.title: 高盛称经济前景恶化 对冲基金抛售金融股
item.description: 对冲基金加大了对金融股的抛售力度，因为美国经济增长出现疲软迹象，而且该行业接近关键技术位。【原文：Hedge funds ramped up their selling of financial stocks as US economic growth shows signs of weakness and the sector approaches a key technical level.】

item.title: 加拿大皇家银行任命斯托普尼克领导改组后的全球投资银行部
item.description: 加拿大皇家银行的投资银行业务采用了全球架构，并任命马修-斯托普尼克（Matthew Stopnik）为该部门主管。【原文：Royal Bank of Canada has adopted a global structure for its investment-banking business and tapped Matthew Stopnik to head up the division.】

item.title: 荷兰联合政党同意取消 15%的股票回购税
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，正在谈判组建下一届荷兰政府的四个政党已同意取消对股票回购征收 15%的税。【原文：The four parties in talks to form the next Dutch government have agreed to cancel a 15% tax on share buybacks, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 巴西前央行行长坎祖克表示，巴西央行将采取行动安抚投资者
item.description: 据巴西央行的一位前董事称，巴西央行上一次政策会议的纪要将设法安抚因董事会在利率问题上的分歧投票而感到不安的投资者。【原文：Brazil central bank’s minutes to its last policy meeting will seek to calm investors who were rattled by the board’s split vote on interest rates, according to a former director at the institution.】

item.title: 通胀风险加剧，波兰降息前景被推后
item.description: 随着央行对通胀的担忧成倍增加，波兰今年降息的前景越来越渺茫。【原文：Prospects for Polish interest rate reductions this year are dwindling as central banker concerns about inflation multiply.】

item.title: 肯尼亚 15%的基础设施债券税可能会阻碍外国投资
item.description: 肯尼亚政府计划开始对基础设施债券的利息征税，税率高达 15%，此举可能会损害这种流行证券的外汇流入。【原文：The Kenyan government plans to start taxing interest from infrastructure bonds by as much as 15%, a move that could hurt foreign currency inflows for the popular securities.】

item.title: 津巴布韦将恢复移动支付服务，货币崩溃曾是其罪魁祸首
item.description: 津巴布韦将允许曾被指责为助长其现已失效的津巴布韦元崩溃的移动货币代理商重新运营，以促进其新的黄金支持货币的使用。【原文：Zimbabwe will allow mobile money agents, once blamed for fueling the collapse of its now defunct Zimbabwean dollar, to operate again to boost the use of its new gold-backed currency.】

item.title: 据说 TDR 接近收购意大利零售商 Acqua & Sapone
item.description: 知情人士透露，TDR Capital 正在与美国投资公司 H.I.G. Capital 就收购意大利折扣零售商 Acqua & Sapone 进行独家磋商。【原文：TDR Capital is in exclusive discussions to buy Italian discount retailer Acqua & Sapone from US investment firm H.I.G. Capital, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 瑞银集团埃尔莫蒂称自己可能留任首席执行官至 2027 年初
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）首席执行官塞尔吉奥-埃尔莫蒂（Sergio Ermotti）打算继续执掌这家瑞士银行，直到完成吸收合并瑞士信贷（Credit Suisse）的任务，这意味着他可能会在位到 2027 年初。【原文：UBS Group AG Chief Executive Officer Sergio Ermotti intends to stay at the helm of the Swiss bank until the task of absorbing Credit Suisse is complete, meaning he could be in place until early 2027.】

item.title: 可可因主要种植国降雨预报而下滑
item.description: 可可期货价格出现了一周以来的最大跌幅，天气转湿的预报预计将有利于主要生产商。【原文：Cocoa futures saw the largest price drop in a week, with a forecast of wetter weather expected to be beneficial for key producers.】

item.title: 瑞银集团埃尔莫蒂认为瑞士信贷 IT 整合存在延迟风险
item.description: 瑞银集团首席执行官塞尔吉奥-埃尔莫蒂（Sergio Ermotti）表示，瑞银集团整合瑞士信贷技术系统的最大风险是延迟，这将推迟实现合并带来的成本节约。【原文：The biggest risk in UBS Group AG’s integration of Credit Suisse’s technology systems is a delay that would push back the realization of cost savings from the merger, Chief Executive Officer Sergio Ermotti said.】

item.title: Ozempic制造商诺和诺德计划出售债券为扩张提供资金
item.description: 诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）计划两年多来首次出售债券，以资助其扩大大片治疗药物生产的大型项目。【原文：Novo Nordisk A/S plans to sell bonds for the first time in more than two years to help finance its large program to expand production of its blockbuster treatments.】

item.title: 保时捷 911 混合动力车配备电池组，性能更出众
item.description: 保时捷公司（Porsche AG）首次在其 911 跑车上安装了电池，该车型的电动机与传统汽油发动机协同工作，以提高性能。【原文：Porsche AG is adding a battery to its 911 sports car for the first time with the model’s electric motor working in tandem with its conventional gasoline engine to boost performance.】

item.title: 必和必拓称英美资源集团已拒绝修订提案
item.description: 必和必拓集团（BHP Group Ltd.）称，英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）拒绝了该公司提出的更高报价，该公司称该报价对该公司的估值为 340 亿英镑（430 亿美元）。【原文：BHP Group Ltd. said Anglo American Plc rebuffed an improved offer it made, which it said valued the company at £34 billion ($43 billion).】

item.title: 纽约证券交易所总裁认为将有更多美国公司寻求上市
item.description: 纽约证券交易所总裁林恩-马丁（Lynn Martin）表示，美国首次公开发行股票的市场正在开放，越来越多的公司决定首次出售股票。【原文：The market for US initial public offerings is opening up, with more companies deciding to sell shares for the first time, New York Stock Exchange President Lynn Martin said.】

item.title: 史泰博寻求 18 亿美元贷款作为债务再融资的一部分
item.description: 以摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）为首的银行正在为史泰博公司（Staples Inc.【原文：Banks led by Morgan Stanley are kicking off a $1.8 billion leveraged loan sale for Staples Inc. as the office supplier seeks to refinance its debt load.】

item.title: 期权交易员押注通胀数据和英伟达，期待下一次大幅波动
item.description: 交易员们正在关注本周的美国通胀数据，以寻找打破市场平静的可能。【原文：Traders are eyeing this week’s US inflation data for a potential break in the calm that’s come over the market.】

item.title: 矿工前往迈阿密，目光聚焦必和必拓和盎格鲁集团
item.description:
重要的行业会议可能会被历史性追求的下一步行动所掩盖。【原文：

Key industry conference will likely be overshadowed by next steps in historic pursuit.

】

item.title: 俄罗斯大选后的开支使预算陷入严重赤字
item.description: 克里姆林宫在弗拉基米尔-普京总统于今年 3 月连任后打开了财政水龙头，尽管石油收入激增，但预算再次陷入严重赤字。【原文：The Kremlin opened up the fiscal taps after President Vladimir Putin’s reelection in March, putting the budget back into deep deficit despite a surge in oil revenues.】

item.title: REN 在将太阳能项目接入电网的同时加大投资力度
item.description: 葡萄牙电力和天然气电网运营商 REN-Redes Energeticas Nacionais SA 表示，随着更多太阳能项目接入电网，该公司计划在 2027 年之前增加投资。【原文：REN-Redes Energeticas Nacionais SA, the operator of Portugal’s electricity and natural gas grids, said it plans to boost investment through 2027 as it links more solar energy projects to the network.】

item.title: 据说沙特财富基金将邀请银行为 Nupco 首次公开募股投标
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯主权财富基金已邀请银行参与王国最大的医疗采购公司计划中的首次公开募股，为王储雄心勃勃的愿景寻求资金。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s sovereign wealth fund has invited banks to pitch for roles on the planned initial public offering of the kingdom’s largest medical procurement firm, as it seeks funds to finance the crown prince’s ambitious vision.】

item.title: Point72 前数字资产主管阿什比加入专有交易公司 AlgoQuant
item.description: 迈克尔-阿什比（Michael Ashby）最近曾领导对冲基金公司 Point72 的数字资产战略实施工作，现在他加入了专有加密货币交易公司 AlgoQuant。【原文：Michael Ashby, who most recently led the digital-asset strategic implementation at hedge fund firm Point72, has joined the proprietary crypto trading firm AlgoQuant.】

item.title: Lilium 正在与法国商谈资助事宜，德国援助仍处于停滞状态
item.description: Lilium NV 公司正在与法国政府进行深入谈判，希望获得补贴和贷款担保，以换取在法国的生产，这为这家德国飞行出租车公司在寻求从本国获得新资金后提供了可能的喘息机会。【原文：Lilium NV is in advanced talks with the French government to receive subsidies and loan guarantees in exchange for production in France, offering a possible respite for the German flying taxi firm after it sought to pull in fresh funding from its home country.】

item.title: 土耳其傲视全球的里拉套利交易仍有上涨空间
item.description: 过去六个月来，借入美元和投资土耳其里拉一直是新兴市场表现最好的套利交易，一些银行家表示，只要正统政策得到保障，通胀开始放缓，这仅仅是个开始。【原文：Borrowing in U.S. dollars and investing in Turkish lira has been the best-performing carry trade in emerging markets over the past six months, and some bankers say that’s just the beginning as long as orthodox policies are safeguarded and inflation starts slowing.】

item.title: 巴克莱银行称，出售 TSB 将使 BBVA 在萨瓦德尔竞购中获得更多现金
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays）分析师称，如果毕尔巴鄂维斯卡亚阿根廷银行（Banco Bilbao Vizcaya Argentaria SA）出售萨瓦德尔银行（Sabadell）的英国分行，就能为其对萨瓦德尔银行（Banco de Sabadell SA）的恶意收购增添现金。【原文：Banco Bilbao Vizcaya Argentaria SA would be able to add cash to its hostile takeover bid for Banco de Sabadell SA if it sold Sabadell’s UK unit, according to Barclays analysts.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。随着 CPI 逼近，股市暂停，货币基金全力押注央行。以下是交易员们正在谈论的话题。【原文：Good morning. Stocks take a pause as CPI looms into view and currency funds go all in on central bank bets. Here’s what traders are talking about.— David Goodman】

item.title: 企业撤回罗马尼亚投标，欧盟将关闭对中国太阳能的调查
item.description: 欧盟周一表示，将结束对中国公司竞标罗马尼亚太阳能园区的调查，因为这些公司正在退出竞标。【原文：The European Union said Monday that it will close probes into bids by Chinese firms for a Romanian solar park because the companies are pulling out of the tender.】

item.title: 新加坡候任总理黄教安在改组中与守旧派保持一致
item.description: 新加坡即将上任的总理黄遵宪挑选了贸易部长颜金勇作为副手，卸任总理李显龙的内阁基本保持不变。【原文：Singapore’s incoming Prime Minister Lawrence Wong picked Trade Minister Gan Kim Yong as his deputy, keeping the cabinet of outgoing premier Lee Hsien Loong largely intact.】

item.title: 德国建筑工人 17 年来首次罢工
item.description: 德国一些建筑工人正准备在本周举行罢工行动，这是他们 17 年来首次为争取更高的工资而罢工。【原文：Some construction workers in Germany are gearing up for strike action this week, the first time in 17 years they’ve walked off the job in a demand for better pay.】
